entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who follow Lord Voldemort, mentioned as those he had once counted friends.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, also known as Tom Riddle, mentioned as the master of Wormtail.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who has a curious affinity with rats and is a follower of Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: A witch from the Ministry of Magic who meets Wormtail at an inn.

entities.name: albanian forest
entities.description: A place where small animals have met their deaths by a dark shadow that possesses them.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: An organization mentioned as the workplace of Bertha Jorkins.

relationships.description: Wormtail is a follower of Lord Voldemort, mentioned as his master.
Wormtail meets Bertha Jorkins at an inn.
Lord Voldemort is the leader of the Death Eaters, mentioned as those he had once counted friends.
Wormtail has a curious affinity with rats.
